title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Joy Taylor steps in for Colin Cowherd talking about Kyrie Irving's decision to return to the Nets and why we need to stop expecting Kyrie to change who he is at this point in his career. She believes Draymond Green when he says the Warriors can win 3 out of the next 4 NBA championships. She also lays out what Baker Mayfield and the Browns need to sort out while they await news of a Deshaun Watson suspension. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to discuss the Lakers hopes for next season after missing out on Kyrie and likely holding onto Russell Westbrook for another season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
